description.narrative: Advocacy for child rights agencies, artistes, sports people and the private sector are engaged in partnerships promoting the rights of all girls and boys in a gender sensitive way (OT 796), which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Evaluation And Research, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2016 all boys and girls from the poorest communities are accessing pre-school and early stimulation opportunities, are benefiting from positive child-centered approaches at school and are benefitting from law and polices that protect them from neglect, violence, exploitation and discrimination.
